about_the_game:
Core Gameplay

'Terralora is a simple Roguelike where you traverse a shattered world to overthrow a tyrannical kingdom. Take on the role of a chaotic little knight: Skye, as you explore procedurally generated chapters filled with secrets, mysteries, and many mystical treasures!'

Key Features!!

  • Encounter and conquer dozens of unique enemies!

  • Overcome challenging bosses!

  • Discover hundreds of unique rooms over several zones!

  • Master a simple, yet expansive combat and customization system.

  • Adventure with many allies along the way???

  • And... uh... some more stuff

Terralora started out as a passion project meant to further explore aspects of roguelike design and exploration that aren't developed as much in other titles. Terralora features pixel-style graphics with fluid animations and utilizes shaders to create a more modern pixel art aesthetic. Gameplay is simple but there are still many ways to play. There are many playstyles to explore! This game has something to offer for both newcomers to the genre and well-seasoned veterans.

Terralora prides itself on its wide variety of unique weapons and trinkets. Each weapon has custom gameplay, and trinkets further develop those by introducing new abilities and stats. Perhaps you may even find unique synergies between specific weapons and trinkets! You can create a playstyle unique to you, and use what you can find to build something unique.

Terralora has a huge emphasis on exploration; many rooms have their own story to tell beyond their gameplay value. No run will quite be the same, and there'll always be something new to discover! So, take your time exploring each of the zones, who knows what you might find?

"Well, what are you waiting for? Buy NOW! Oh wait, the game isn't out yet... "

"A wishlist would be appreciated... :P and you can check out the demo!"

name: Terralora

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Terralora is a simple Rogue-lite where you traverse a shattered world to overthrow a tyrannical kingdom. Take on the role of a chaotic little knight: Skye, as you explore procedurally generated chapters filled with secrets, mysteries, and many untold treasures! You can play the demo for free now!!!!
